search.query: | inputlookup illumio_workloads_lookup WHERE pce_fqdn=$pce_tok|s$ org_id=$org_id_tok|s$ deleted=0 (hostname=$host_ip|s$ OR public_ip=$host_ip|s$) | search $label_filter$

| tstats `summariesonly` values(Audit.src_user) AS src_user, values(Audit.user) AS user, values(Audit.src_ip) AS src_ip, values(Audit.notification_type) AS notification_type, values(Audit.severity) AS severity, values(Audit.status) AS status, values(Audit.pce_fqdn) AS pce_fqdn, values(Audit.event_type) AS event_type, values(Audit.object_id) AS object_id FROM datamodel=Illumio.Audit WHERE Audit.pce_fqdn=$pce_tok|s$ Audit.org_id=$org_id_tok|s$ (Audit.event_type="agent.*" OR Audit.event_type="workload.*" OR Audit.event_type="workloads.*") Audit.event_type!="*.create" Audit.event_type!="*.update" Audit.event_type!="*.delete" BY _time Audit.timestamp Audit.href | lookup illumio_workloads_lookup href AS object_id OUTPUTNEW href AS workload_href, name, hostname, public_ip, labels | lookup illumio_workloads_lookup ven.href AS object_id OUTPUTNEW href AS workload_href, name, hostname, public_ip, labels | search $label_filter$ (hostname=$host_ip|s$ OR public_ip=$host_ip|s$) | eval Workload = if(isnull(name), hostname, name) | rename Audit.href AS href
| inputlookup illumio_workloads_lookup | stats count BY pce_fqdn
| inputlookup illumio_workloads_lookup WHERE pce_fqdn=$pce_tok|s$ | stats count BY org_id
| inputlookup illumio_labels_lookup WHERE pce_fqdn=$pce_tok|s$ org_id=$org_id_tok|s$ deleted=0 | eval label = key + ":" + value | table href label

html.div: Please specify either hostname(s) or scope labels. If both hostname and scope labels are specified, then the filter uses AND condition.

search.query: | search ven.status=* | rename ven.status AS Status | stats count BY Status
| rename enforcement_mode AS "Enforcement Mode" | stats count BY "Enforcement Mode"
| fillnull value="unknown" agent.status.security_policy_sync_state | rename agent.status.security_policy_sync_state AS "Policy Sync State" | stats count BY "Policy Sync State"

| lookup illumio_labels_lookup pce_fqdn href AS labels OUTPUT key AS label_key value AS label_value | lookup illumio_workload_interfaces_lookup workload_href AS href OUTPUTNEW name AS interface_name, address AS interface_address | eval Workload = if(isnull(name), hostname, name) | eval OS = os_id + " - " + os_detail | eval Online = if(online = 1, "online", "offline") | eval "Updated at" = strftime(strptime(updated_at, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%6NZ"), "%+") | eval "Policy Applied at" = if(isnull('agent.status.security_policy_applied_at'), "No policy applied", strftime(strptime('agent.status.security_policy_applied_at', "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%6NZ"), "%+")) | eval Labels = mvzip(label_key, label_value, ":") | eval Interfaces = mvzip(interface_name, interface_address, ": ") | eval PCE = if(isnotnull('agent.active_pce_fqdn'), 'agent.active_pce_fqdn', pce_fqdn) | rename ven.status AS Status, ven.ven_type AS "VEN Type", enforcement_mode AS "Enforcement Mode", agent.status.security_policy_sync_state AS "Policy Sync State" | table Workload PCE Online Status "Enforcement Mode" Labels OS Interfaces "VEN Type" "Policy Sync State" "Policy Applied at" "Updated at" href | sort - "Updated at"

table.fields: Workload PCE Online Status "Enforcement Mode" Labels OS Interfaces "VEN Type" "Policy Sync State" "Policy Applied at" "Updated at"

search.query: | search event_type=$event_type_tok|s$ severity=$severity_tok|s$ status=$status_tok|s$ | rename Audit.timestamp AS Timestamp | lookup illumio_labels_lookup pce_fqdn href AS labels OUTPUT key AS label_key value AS label_value | eval Labels = mvzip(label_key, label_value, ":") | fillnull value="-" notification_type Labels | table Timestamp pce_fqdn Workload Labels event_type notification_type severity status href | rename pce_fqdn AS PCE, event_type AS "Event Type", notification_type AS "Notification Type", severity AS Severity, status AS Status | eval Timestamp = strptime(Timestamp, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S%Z") | fieldformat Timestamp = strftime(Timestamp, "%+") | sort -Timestamp

table.fields: Timestamp PCE Workload Labels "Event Type" "Notification Type" Severity Status
